main event: A round object, believed to be a star, was observed changing color and circling in spirals before fading from sight.
interesting points: The object was the size of an automobile and observed at a 35-degree elevation,It changed color noticeably for about 10 seconds,The observation lasted for a total of 5 minutes,There were atmospheric conditions that may have affected the visibility of the object,The object's course was noted as circling to the northwest.
witness description: Civilian observer outside during New Year's celebrations
